name: NadoCRM
description:
Our company offers European based companies flexible options to run a nearshore help-desk service for any IT issues along with offshore software development to help our customers adopt smarter working practice and optimize business operating cost.
Our Services * Dedicated offshore software development & nearshore programming service * Technical support & maintenance of complex legacy enterprise IT systems * Enhancements to existing IT business solutions running by the customer * Re-engineering of legacy software systems with use of the latest technologies * Development of technical documentation: manuals, tutorials and other * Staffing service to help companies rapidly find IT personnel with special skills
Due to modern Internet technologies, the nearshore technical team can work like it would occupy your office next door, but at much lower operating cost. We may communicate with your clients via the Web, regional (transfer calls service) phone/fax line and Skype helping resolve any IT issues. We can also help you take advantage of offshore software development to drive technical innovation in your company.
